channel.title: Authors on Marcelo Sousa
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Marcelo Sousa

item.description: I am working on methodologies and technologies towards a new generation of products to improve how people collaborate with others and their cyber-physical ecosystems. My interests encompass a broad spectrum of areas. Besides the ever growing list of theoretical problems, I am focused on the following: Computer-aided software analysis. I’m actively working on the combination of state-of-the-art research in mathematical logic, software analysis and technologies to build tools that understand code at the global scale (think all code snippets available online).
